# SeptCode Web (LLMs)

This file provides a compact index for language models and agents.

## Site
- Name: SeptCode Web
- Type: Next.js 14 web client
- Primary language: Japanese

## Main Routes
- `/` : Timeline / home
- `/login` : Login page
- `/register` : Registration page
- `/search` : User/content search
- `/u/{id}` : User profile
- `/posts/{id}` : Post detail
- `/posts/{id}/edit` : Post edit

## Public API Endpoints
- `/api/health` : Health check
- `/api/timeline` : Timeline data

## Discovery
- `/robots.txt`
- `/sitemap.xml`
- Full reference: `/llms-full.txt`
